attributes.action: Require leads, muzzles and licences for all dogs
attributes.additional_details: There are too many dog attacks, and we think these changes would help tackle this.
attributes.background: Change the law to make it a legal requirement to keep a dog on a lead and wearing a muzzle in any public place. Also require all dog owners have a licence to own their dogs.

departments.name: Department for Environment, Food and Rural Affairs
